format: A data frame with 48 observations on the following 2 variables.
description:
Description
Study from the 1970s about whether sex influences hiring recommendations.
title: Bank manager recommendations based on sex
reference:
Rosen B and Jerdee T. 1974. Influence of sex role stereotypes on
personnel decisions. Journal of Applied Psychology 59(1):9-14.

parameters.sex: a factor with levels female and male
parameters.decision: a factor with levels not promoted and promoted
